text: @realDonaldTrump The 50th anniversary Earth Day. For Earth-observing satellites, every day is Earth Day. While news COVID-19 dominates headlines and many  us practice social distancing, there still remains the need for action on climate change – and satellites are vital in providing the key facts https://t.co/NMX4gHDfmj
